Airblaster! Leg Bag

Posted on Saturday, December 04, 2004

Well I’ve been lucky enough to find an Airblaster Leg Bag. Most stores sold out in the first few hours, but a local to Killington has an extra he is willing to sell for retail. Soon I will be an owner of a blue and orange Leg Bag! Why? They’re awesome, they’re funny, they’re pointless.
